wynd.title: wynd
wynd.description: wynd delivers hyperlocal wind data with real-time precision — exactly where it matters: where you ride. Powered by AI and backed by the fastest-growing wind sports community on Earth.
features: Built for kitesurfers, wingfoilers & wind lovers

flowboost.title: flowboost
flowboost.description: flowboost is your AI system for generating brand-safe content. Powered by intelligent agents, it connects your data, teams, and channels to streamline every step from strategy to publishing.
features: AI content studio with SEO & formatting

breathe.title: breathe
breathe.description:
In a world that’s becoming faster and more artificial
breathe brings calm and mindfulness back to your life.
It helps you slow down, reconnect,
and create space in the everyday
for what truly matters.
features: Awareness for a more present life
